UNOMI_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of your Apache Unomi server (e.g., http://your-unomi-server:8181)
UNOMI_BASE_URL.title: UNOMI_BASE_URL

UNOMI_USERNAME.description: The username to authenticate with the Apache Unomi server, default is 'karaf'
UNOMI_USERNAME.title: UNOMI_USERNAME

UNOMI_PASSWORD.description: The password to authenticate with the Apache Unomi server, default is 'karaf'
UNOMI_PASSWORD.title: UNOMI_PASSWORD

UNOMI_PROFILE_ID.description: The ID of the user profile to be used for context management
UNOMI_PROFILE_ID.title: UNOMI_PROFILE_ID

UNOMI_KEY.description: The authorization key required for secured operations with the Unomi server, defaults to '670c26d1cc413346c3b2fd9ce65dab41'
UNOMI_KEY.title: UNOMI_KEY

UNOMI_EMAIL.description: The email address associated with the user profile, used for profile lookup
UNOMI_EMAIL.title: UNOMI_EMAIL

UNOMI_SOURCE_ID.description: An identifier for the source of the request (e.g., claude-desktop)
UNOMI_SOURCE_ID.title: UNOMI_SOURCE_ID
